channel.title: How do i get add 120 capes to my 718
channel.description:
How do i add 120 capes? 718
i got the capes from
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,537454.0.html
but how do i add them. i got item def editor

item.title: How do i get add 120 capes to my 718
item.dc:creator: @ozarka_cody ozarka cody
item.description:
@ozarka_cody wrote:

[quote=“Pure_, post:4, topic:541417”][quote author=Revamp dis Shit link=topic=660287.msg4415013#msg4415013 date=1395487630]

Client-sided. Add the definitions to your client and add the models to your cache.

edit: Requirements will be done server-sided though obviously.

Aren’t certain model headers/etc needed?
[/quote]Yes, depending on which revision he got them from some modifications will need to be made to allow it to render properly.[/quote]

Ok i have the .dat files of them but where do i put them?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get add 120 capes to my 718

item.title: How do i get add 120 capes to my 718
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“Revamp dis Shit, post:3, topic:541417”][quote author=Pure_ link=topic=660287.msg4414971#msg4414971 date=1395458122]
Client-sided. Add the definitions to your client and add the models to your cache.

edit: Requirements will be done server-sided though obviously.
[/quote]
Aren’t certain model headers/etc needed?[/quote]Yes, depending on which revision he got them from some modifications will need to be made to allow it to render properly.

Read full topic
